data.title: Georgia Superior Court Clerks
data.text:
OFFICE HOURS

MONDAY - FRIDAY

8:00 am - 5:00 pm

To check court dates or request a change of court date call (770) 830-5830

ALL Passport Applications: Regular and Expedite REQUIRE an appointment!

(770) 830 - 5830 ext.1211

FOR CARRY (GUN) PERMITS CALL PROBATE COURT AT (770)830-5840

The dedicated personnel of the Carroll County Superior and State Courts and I, Alan J. Lee - Clerk of Court, are proud to serve you in every way. There has been and will continue to be an open door policy for your access to the Clerk of Courts. My staff and I will gladly assist you.

We hope that this web site will greatly expand the resources of the Clerk's office and help make your experience at the Carroll County Courthouse more efficient and convenient. I look forward to continuing my service to the citizens of Carroll County; now and in the future. Your input is important to us. Please feel free to email or respond with comments and/or suggestions on our feedback pages.

We are located at:

311 Newnan Street - Carrollton, GA 30117
